website_summaries.verdict: One of the best saucer chairs to choose for extra support and comfort around the upper body.
pros: Steel frame keeps its shape under heavy weight
Additional cup holder and padded headrest offer more utility than most budget saucer chairs
cons: Frame joints and connections are prone to breaking when transporting the chair

customer_reviews.title: Loved this chair at first
customer_reviews.text: Loved this chair at first. Comfortable and large enough for a person 6' 3" and 225 lbs. The problem I have is in the construction. The frame at the top-middle of the backrest is double-jointed. There is a piece of plastic that covers the joint, and only bends one one. The piece snagged on the fabric during bagging and snapped. With back frame without the plastic to firm the joint the frame basically folds during use. Which is to say the chair is unusable. Bought it because of the number of recommendations, so I must be one of the few that had this happen. Regardless, it happened and exposed what I believe to be a design flaw that is unfixable.
customer_reviews.author: W.A.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material already ripped after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this product two days and the material has already ripped on the inside. I am very disappointed especially because there were many other cheaper options for this chair. If it wasn't such an inconvenience to return it because it's so large, I would. I am not a heavy person, therefore the material should not rip from sitting on it, especially new.
customer_reviews.author: scott H.

customer_reviews.title: Both boys say the chair is comfortable; however
customer_reviews.text: Chair breaks in the same spot. I bought two of these chairs, one for each of my sons. They have only used them indoors and the plastic piece on the chair cracked. Reviews described the same thing, but I was hoping it was wrong. Both boys say the chair is comfortable; however, for $50 and not lasting 6 months is ridiculous. Must be a design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Superb!
customer_reviews.text: We really love this chair. Very comfortable. Much bigger than our other moon chair which was a nice surprise. The cup holder is actually useful and the pillow is a really nice touch. Great for curling up and reading under a tree. Seems well built. Can't comment on long term durability but I'm impressed with the build quality so far. We waffled on getting this one but have no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: A. Falco

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable but very nondurable
customer_reviews.text: When it first arrived, I loved it! Super comfortable and I could even curl up and nap! Comfortably! Folding and unfolding is easy once you learn to do it properly. Worked beautifully for a month. Started sagging at the one month Mark and one of the plastic joints broke busy after the two month mark. It's still comfortable but I was expecting more durability since I only weight about half of the Max. And now I can't return it :/
customer_reviews.author: E.V.Sanders

customer_reviews.title: You'll LOVE This Chair!
customer_reviews.text: Best chair for camping ever! I would have bought two of these if I had known it was so comfortable! This is the chair everybody wants to sit in, but we bought another of the usual kind of campfire chairs. If you're hesitating for any reason, DON'T. I feel 100% confident that you will love this chair too!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina L. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable chair. I used it for my ‘bachelor pad’ (work apartment, away from home) because I didn’t want to buy ‘real’ furniture. Unfortunately, it broke in two places within 6 months of use. I’m in the apartment only 4 nights per week and use this chair for watching TV and the odd video game....maybe two hours each night. I’m 6’2” and weight 240lbs. Thought this chair would hold my big body while sitting...not doing any crazy activity in the thing. It’s a bit disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Philsminions

customer_reviews.title: Some trouble folding up sometimes
customer_reviews.text: Before purchasing I read a review saying it gave someone trouble while folding up. I tested mine out when I got it and no problems at all. After using it a few times I thought nah e the other person got a bad one... then while on the beach with my chair, an ice chest, beach bag full of stuff and a 7 yr old, the chair would not fold!! After trying for over 15/20 minutes, I finally forced it back down. It didn’t break it but one of the hindges don’t bend correctly anymore. So just be careful
customer_reviews.author: Kayla B.

customer_reviews.title: Great versatile lounger.
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy and convenient for moving around. A little tricky to figure out how to collapse at first (press down on the top sides and use a knee to push from bottom of seat inward). I actually use in our home for my multi-purpose room- sometimes my office, sometimes my yoga room, and sometimes my Netflix lounge. Love that it folds away to the size of an upright vacuum. Cup holder isn't super sturdy but does the trick, especially if you are using as intended for outdoor use- it holds a beer bottle no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen A.

customer_reviews.title: Buy a Magellan.
customer_reviews.text: Brittle plastic in places. No markings to indicate how to fold it up; if you don't already know, and you didn't unfold it, good luck trying to figure it out. The cupholder broke the first time it was used, which was fine, I suppose, as it was poorly placed and flimsy. Update: completely broken and in the trash. The back hinges - right behind the head - snapped, you can see this in other review photos. My Magellan "Wolfe Creek" chair, bought around the same time, is in perfect condition, though.
customer_reviews.author: Coyoteblue

customer_reviews.title: Must-Have chairs. SO COMFORTABLE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to take camping with me and some friends, and they are outstanding chairs!!! There is plenty of room to grab a blanket and completely curl up in the chair. It is by far one of the best online purchases have made, and I am glad to have found them! I take my chairs everywhere with me and have to fight my family and friends to get them back! haha, they really are great chairs though!
customer_reviews.author: Bre C

customer_reviews.title: Everyone is envious!
customer_reviews.text: We have always just used super cheap standard camping chairs, but now that my daughters are entering adulthood and I'm in my 40's I decided to go for chairs that are more sturdy and comfortable and this is perfect. It is a little bulkier than a standard camp chair, and the material probably shouldn't['t be left out overnight if there is a chance of rain, but for a backyard bonfire or for car-camping you can't beat the comfort!
customer_reviews.author: J. Lindquist

customer_reviews.title: Cushy on the tushy!
customer_reviews.text: OK- $25 cheaper than the one I specifically went shopping for (and also bought). Haven't used yet but a pre-use check found it SUPER comfy, cup holder is awesome and it feels STURDY (not like the cheapy ones that break first use). I will have to update after the big camping weekend I bought it for. UPDATE: was "teased" about how big and plush and "spoiled" it looked- until everyone argued over who got to sit in it! Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Gaming Chair
customer_reviews.text: I know I am odd for using this chair this way but it truly is amazing for playing games. Compacting the chair is a little odd but once you learn the trick (fold by bending the middle top up or down) it is pretty simple. The pillow is super comfortable and the collapsible cup holder works great for most normal cup sizes. Please note that the pillow is not removable. Overall this chair is super comfortable, supportable, and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for star-gazing, naps, curling up for a read
customer_reviews.text: This chair has exceeded our expectations. My daughter and I vie for it, even with our different frames. Very sturdy, very comfortable, easy to fold up and move around. Husband thinks it's not comfortable. And that's fine with us. Pillow and cupholder are nice touches. A little pocket for the phone would make it perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Deej

customer_reviews.title: It’s about time I got this chair!
customer_reviews.text: Camping at 30 weeks pregnant with this chair saved my life lol so much better than cheap foldable chairs! Plus I was able to share the seat with the little ones when they were tired or wanted to cuddle.. this chair will stick with me at every outdoor event lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got the defective one.
customer_reviews.text: I would send it back for a new one but I didn't find out until it was already on vacation and I was not sitting on the ground for days. Comfort and joy would all be 5 stars but I got the chair with the off center pillow. Hits my right shoulder and isn't that comfortable. I'm considering cutting it off and resewing. My review is worse because I'd literally gone on a camping trip and I couldn't get comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the chair, but ripping on the seam all a sudden
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this chair, very comfy for all the kids sporting events we are at. Only issue is it recently started to rip along the seam. We've had it about 3 months. She is average in size (145) so but ea weight issue
customer_reviews.author: davidc

customer_reviews.title: This chair means business
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for camping at a music festival but it has seen much more use. This thing is spacious as can be, I'm 5'10 200lb and this chair can handle some abuse. The support straps on bottom are very sturdy and I think I'd have to put some effort in to break them. It has a convenient cup holder that collapses and folds into place for storage. The neck pillow ties the whole thing together and makes for a comfortable experience.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Center bracket behind pillow cracked and broke after only using ...
customer_reviews.text: Center bracket behind pillow cracked and broke after only using chair 5 times. Chair now collapses and can't be used.
customer_reviews.author: NH

customer_reviews.title: Great comfy camp chair
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and easy to fold chair...there is a small area at the top of the back of the chair...a little push and folds like a charm. I think the people reporting broken joints may have been forcing it.
customer_reviews.author: Stormy One

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great chair, so comfy and sturdy and yet easy to pack and store.
customer_reviews.author: Amy E.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one month
customer_reviews.text: The chair itself is comfortable but broke after one-month's use. It doesn't fold up properly anymore and I've only used it like 10 times. Would not purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy K.

customer_reviews.title: Had a similar problem mentioned in other reviews with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Had a similar problem mentioned in other reviews with the double-joint at the top of the chair. One of the sides of the plastic joint snapped, so the support is not level around the head area. Still seems to function for the time being, but i'm hoping to get a warranty replacement or I'll need to find a different product as it's really only a matter of time before the rest of the chair breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: SUPER COMFY!!! MUST BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best buy buy far since I been ordering off Amazon for past year. Needed something to play video games in my bedroom so I'm not bothering others... this chair knocks every seat I've sat in for long periods of time (almost as good as living room furniture). I have fallen asleep few times. Loves that I can pull this out whenever and fold back up and sit back in corner. Highly recommend this to smaller people to curl up in (I'm 230lbs and I almost can along with my 10lb cat) also larger folks will be just as comfortable. Heavy duty and perfect for taking on day trips or as a permanent outside chair/camping chair too.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Place

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband as his 'gaming chair'. He loves the little pillow, and the fact that he can sit cross-legged with plenty of room. I love that he can fold it up and put it in its bag when he's done being a potato. :)
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We love these chairs! Very comfy and sturdy. My husband weighs 290lbs and doesn’t have trouble with sturdiness. These are great for camping, relaxing at the beach or even lounging in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not durable.  Too many plastic pieces used for critical parts.
customer_reviews.text: While the chair is very comfortable to sit it in, the material used to keep the frame together is not so great. All of the joints are held together with plastic pieces and 4 months after owning the chair (where it is used indoors) the plastic pieces failed and now the chair no longer functions as is. The chair was not very durable. Do your research before investing this much money in a folding chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Lounge!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great chair! I needed a lawn chair for a concert, literally overnight, and after researching a good handful, I decided to take the plunge and get this one. I felt like I was on my couch. This was lovely. I could cross my legs and even sit sideways a bit and lay on the attached pillow. I haven't checked cleaning instructions yet but thus far in comfort, I give it an A+!
customer_reviews.author: CaliSD

customer_reviews.title: Broken Leg
customer_reviews.text: Owned for not even a full year and one of the legs broke. I’d understand if I was a huge guy or something but for being someone medium build it should last a lot longer than less than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and durable
customer_reviews.text: Husband was looking for a comfortable chair to use when gaming that can easily be folded up and put away when not in use. This chair fits the bill. We frequently have to shoo our 3 sons out of it (they will all sit in it together). Easy to fold. Comfortable to sit it in. takes up little space.
customer_reviews.author: FloydNSteff

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chair
customer_reviews.text: My son received this chair from a friend and I broke. So I decided to replace it. I kept the broken one specific for the pillow and seating to use on another chair.
customer_reviews.author: MOJo

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and compact when folded
customer_reviews.text: I needed an extra chair occasionally in my office that was more comfy than the nice chairs I have for clients but not my desk chair. I just keep this in the closet. It folds and stores so compact. It is a very comfy relaxing seat. It will be great for camping trips or on the patio as well.
customer_reviews.author: amlo

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I use this chair for my apartment balcony. It's very easy to set up, lightweight, and extremely comfortable. It's a joy to watch the sun rise from it. The padding is comfortable and "oversized" is very accurate! There's plenty of space to lounge or nod off in.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate, buy right now!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable camping chair I've ever sat in!! I was a little hesitant to buy because it is on the pricier side for a camping chair but it's SO WORTH IT! I didn't think a chair could have a significant impact on my camping experience but this chair has actually greatly improved my camping experience. Several other campers even commented on them and asked where we got them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn nice! Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: First sit down, both dogs (70 and 50 lbs) jumped right in with me. Stupid super comfortable and feels very sturdy. Not the easiest to get in the case/bag but given how Cushioned it is, I don’t care. Is definitely on the high side for cost but you can tell where your money went. Very nice unit. FYI, myself and the two pups totaled 285lbs in the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking and buy this chair!
customer_reviews.text: BUY THIS CHAIR. Everyone at my campsites would try to sit in this chair when I wasn't! Obviously it's for glamping, car camping, trailer camping, as it's pretty heavy when folded. But I loved there was room for a me and a small dog, and my nursing friend thought it was perfect for feeding her baby.
customer_reviews.author: aubemstie

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Super comfortable and easily packable for pretty much anything! I use it mostly in my dorm room because the chair I had went missing(it was gone before I arrived.) and so I ordered this chair and it’s probably my favorite chair ever.
customer_reviews.author: Delaney

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE BEST CHAIR AROUND
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE BEST CHAIR AROUND!!! Totally worth the money. It's great for the beach, camping, out in the desert, sitting at the fire. All around best chair ever. All my buddies are now ordering them, especially the mommies because our toddlers can comfortable sit with us where ever we are. My kids even nap in this chair!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gal

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love the style of this chair. Very comfortable. Have not used much so cannot verify durability. A bit cumbersome to fold and replace in bag but may be just nature.
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: Legs snapped from under him
customer_reviews.text: Had chair for couple of weeks, he sat in it this morning and fell to ground, totally unexpected, below weight limit, appeared acrews missing and "steel leg" snapped in half.....but love chair so ordering again......
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it, if you like saucer chairs just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Had been looking for a while to replace my old saucer chair. This one is very comfortable, large (even for me at 6'0" - 265#), and sturdy. I only wish the actual seat area was more mesh for air flow.
customer_reviews.author: Shana Merl

customer_reviews.title: Open and close slow. Don’t leave in the rain.
customer_reviews.text: Big chair. After reading the reviews about joint breaks I gave it a shot. If you open and close slow I think it will be as good as any fold up chair. Probably would not be good around a fire but on our deck it’s perfect. Our guest loved it. Comfortable
customer_reviews.author: JOHN GAMBARDELLA

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable chair.
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar chair that I used for a couple years. I loved it so I purchased this one. I like the way this folds up easily and it is lighter to carry. Only thing I don’t like is it is too hot to sit in s during the summer days. That would be my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: grandmawendy8

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my son and he loves it .....he is 5’ 7”and weighs about 170 and he feels comfortable in it with his legs folded like Indian sit!!!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Alonso

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor shows
customer_reviews.text: I go with my husband to outdoor concerts and summer movies under the stars. These chairs are wonderful. I bring a cubby and curl up in my chair and I'm happy for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Suki

customer_reviews.title: Will eventually break
customer_reviews.text: We bought this chair last year. The problem with it though is that after about 3 months it starts to break. My fiance uses this chair for gaming and doesnt weigh a lot. We emailed the company about it and they sent us a replacement. That one as well started to break. It hasnt completley broke yet and we still are able to use it, but beware this will happen to the chair. Other than that, it is a comfy chair and I love that it has a cup holder!
customer_reviews.author: Lovedarkstar

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are great and comfy. I was worried because I’m a larger person. But even I could loung sideways in them. Only reason for four stars is they are somewhat difficult to collapse, or I haven’t learned the trick.
customer_reviews.author: HonestAndTrue

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I wonder if those plastic pieces that hold the chair together are replaceable? It snapped after months of use. I wish I could just replace that part and continue to use it because it was very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana

customer_reviews.title: This chair is awesome. I use it as extra chair for when ...
customer_reviews.text: This chair is awesome. I use it as extra chair for when friends are just hanging out in my room or when I want to play old vid games on my small tv. Comfy and easy to fold. Personally never used it outside but I’m sure it’s great for that too.
customer_reviews.author: Hatayo22

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Make a little noise after being broken in. Me and my wife have sat in it together and it held up over the recommended weight limit.
customer_reviews.author: King

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve Only had this chair for about 5-6 months and one day I was in my chair relaxing and all of a sudden the thing snapped right from underneath me. The frame itself is fine, but one of the plastic pieces snapped and there is no support on the seating area, so now it’s pretty much useless unless I make some sort of platform underneath, but I don’t really want to do that
customer_reviews.author: Drizzle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This chair is so well made and designed perfectly. I had to order another one.
customer_reviews.author: J STONER

customer_reviews.title: Don't love it. To uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Not fluffy like in the picture, hurts your legs with the metal bars. Wish I didn't purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon russell

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this chair is a gift and it's wonderful. Great for at home. Wonderful for the beach. Wonderful for the park. Oversized and super comfy. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: JODI BURTON

customer_reviews.title: Yes - buy this chair!
customer_reviews.text: Best. Chair. Ever. This chair is high quality, and durable. I use it on camping trips, and it’s so comfortable that I sleep in it. I would buy this again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: The big comfy chair you’re looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this chair! I bought it to go camping with my boyfriend and I was so glad I did. The headrest really was what won it over for me it was so comfy. It’s also really big I’m 5’8 and I was able to sit in this chair with my 65 lb pitbull on my lap under a blanket which was great on a cold night. I would buy this again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: heather haviland

customer_reviews.title: comfy and roomy
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! It fits me and 1 of y kids on my lap. I would like the cup holder to be a bit bigger but at least it has one. My family loves this chair too, they keep stealing it. The headrest is a great touch too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after three months with weekend use only
customer_reviews.text: We bought this chair for camping. Ordered it on June 1 and used it on 7 trips. At first it was great except that it got sweat stained very easily. Very comfortable for a 6' 190 lb man. One of the plastic joints broke on our last trip. I don't see any option to return it and from the other reviews it doesn't sound like it's possible. Find another chair.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Knight

customer_reviews.title: Most.Comfortable.Chair.Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have had several chairs with foot stands, coolers and the like. This is the only chair that I can fall asleep in. That should say it all.
customer_reviews.author: Mariealena Dagostino

customer_reviews.title: A great chair
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for teenagers room. They love it. Works really well. Comfy etc.
customer_reviews.author: SteampunkPhotos

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big guy. 272 lbs. The description says clearly up to 300 lbs, which is why I bought it. I sat on it 4 times before it broke from multiple points.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and comfy chair.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a tall man as a gift. Fits perfect with room to spare. Definitely happy with this purchase. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: This chair won’t fold. My daughter has it in her dorm room and it broke the first time she opened it - just like other reviews say, it won’t fold. Now she’s away at college and can’t return it. Total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Kuiken

customer_reviews.title: big and comfortable. My husband is 6'4" and 250lbs and he ...
customer_reviews.text: big and comfortable. My husband is 6'4" and 250lbs and he fits in it nicely. Ordered this initially for my dog who is a lab/pit mix and 62lbs. We will be using it for a camping chair for my dog and my husband!
customer_reviews.author: J.A.R

customer_reviews.title: Best Camping Chair
customer_reviews.text: Don't tell my husband, but I originally bought this chair for our dog when we go camping. However...it's so comfortable, she has to share with us. Super comfy - will probably buy another next season!
customer_reviews.author: Sara D Nix

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely would buy again! I hate other food up chairs because they make me feel like they are going to break, but this one is sturdy and comfortable! I love the built in cup holder!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Stylish!
customer_reviews.text: So much more comfortable then I ever expected from the reviews. The chair literally hugs you. The neck pillow is at a perfect position. My friends were absolutely jelly of the comfort and stylishness, but i’m also 5’4 and a bit of a style snob. Authentic camping gear and stylish for that IG pic. (Don’t @ me, this is a huge plus in today’s market)
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Chacón

customer_reviews.title: Yaaas
customer_reviews.text: So comfy I'm 5'8 thick girl and this is it a lot of space for me to lay sideways and take a nap in it at work. A little hard to get it to close but if you stand behind the chair and close it from behind
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: Awesome chair. My husband saw one of these papsan camping chairs and wanted one. This is so comfy. Also perfect for cuddling the toddler. And it comes with a drink holder.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Alba

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy chair that stands up to teenagers
customer_reviews.text: I have bought so many of these chairs bc I have a teenage son who always has friends over. They usually rip, break or fall apart before long. This is the first chair that has lasted. A little expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use it everyday. The best.
customer_reviews.text: If you like saucer chairs, buy this chair. It's a permanent fixture in my den, forget outside! Perfect for camping too. So comfortable! The pillow is a necessity.
customer_reviews.author: Andy A.

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to unfold and fold and most importantly very steady and super comfortable! Fits two adults!
customer_reviews.author: Dddnxdd

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: It’s far better then any other chair we’ve had. As sports parent to 3 boys playing all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. I say trade and my dog always wants to sit with me and this chair is perfect for us. It’s easy to fold up once you figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s comfortable, i wish it was more padded had friends fall asleep in it. But when i moved sat in this chair for 2 weeks before i had a couch and that was the true test. It needs more padding.
customer_reviews.author: Ameeiey

customer_reviews.title: Good chair. Fair price.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a comfortable chair and looks well made. We’ve only taken it to the parks to hangout so we’ll see if it survives camping. My wife enjoys using it.
customer_reviews.author: Lora Lalogan

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and easy to carry. Just not as padded as I was expecting. My husband is 210lbs though and this chair was great for him. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Cierra Marie

customer_reviews.title: Not for every day use I guess...
customer_reviews.text: I loved my chair. I have wanted a round chair for awhile and was beyond excited that I found this one. My only issue is now that I have had my chair since March it just broke :(. I really did love this chair....
customer_reviews.author: Latina730

customer_reviews.title: Camping chair
customer_reviews.text: Likes: Very comfortable, good size, good quality and sturdy. Use it for camping. Dislike: Doesn't fold up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: A lot bigger than I thought it would be! So comfy! Cup holder is kind of a joke, but otherwise sturdy construction.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Long

customer_reviews.title: Great little chair for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson. He likes to have his own space while playing his games. Great cup holder easy to spot clean. Folds up and stores easily.
customer_reviews.author: Odie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Chair
customer_reviews.text: I just love this chair. It's so comfy and just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Dorm must have!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous chair. We purchased for my son’s dorm room so he could have a foldable chair to use when watching tv. It is super comfty and he loves it, favorite thing in his dorm. All his friends want one!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Best camping chair yet. Aside from cup holder
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. Really comfy and easy to set up and take down. Took off one star for the cup holder being flimsy and unstable.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this chair!!! Very compact but very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tim and Brooke Stetz

customer_reviews.title: Round chairs always a hit, good for big and tall
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable! I'm a big guy (6' 2" 270#) and it's great for me. Nice carrying bag and cup holder even.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Grier

customer_reviews.title: Came ripped
customer_reviews.text: Just took my Father’s Day present out to use it and noticed it came with a rip in the stitching. It’s a bummer. This chair feels and looks great. I don’t live close to a ups store and would be a pain in the but to return so I’ll just keep it and hope it doesn’t continue to rip
customer_reviews.author: alonso pina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Best moonchair ever. It's huge and I sit in it comfortably! It even has a cupholder and the attached neck pillow is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Angelique Kalamer

customer_reviews.title: Stitching defect
customer_reviews.text: Used for first time October 19, 2019 which is 9 days past return window. When I removed chair from carry bag, I noticed the stitching on the pillow was not fully stitched. Bummed I missed the return window. Would like it replaced because it is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoors or indoor
customer_reviews.text: Great chair oversized n pretty comfy. Great for outdoors or indoor. My daughter used it for college dorm room. Loves it
customer_reviews.author: MARK TWAIN

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS CHAIR
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS CHAIR!!!! So comfortable and huge! I can sit in it with my 3 dogs joining me!!! Just what I wanted...cant wait to use it camping with the family.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Bjork

customer_reviews.title: It broke in a month
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair in early February and on April 13th it broke. One of the plastic joints cracked and I wrapped it with duct tape for now but I don't think this will hold.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s OK however if it’s hot outside do you get very sweaty is not very breathable
customer_reviews.author: Dominique H

customer_reviews.title: Comfy BUT can’t clean it.
customer_reviews.text: It is a really comfy chair, unfortunately over the winter it got mildewed. Cloth can’t be removed so it trash now.
customer_reviews.author: David Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable at all
customer_reviews.text: Not very comfortable at all. Back actually hurts after sitting in it a while. My hunt for the perfect camping chair continues...
customer_reviews.author: Katie Thieman

customer_reviews.title: Chairs
customer_reviews.text: I thought I only ordered I chair. Mainly to see how big it was. It was too big. The king camp chair I received today was perfect size. I still don't know why I got 2 of the other chairs?
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Structural design could be better
customer_reviews.text: I got this to have while I'm working out of town just to keep things simple and although it is comfortable for a gold up chair, I just noticed that one of the plastic connections behind the pillow broke. It's not even out in the sun?
customer_reviews.author: Neil Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: Not even a month into it and the top part of the frame broke. Now it's a little over three months into it and the screw broke on the bottom part of the frame and jabs into my right leg. $55 down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $70
customer_reviews.text: Broke just above the cup holder after two months of use. Never was folded up never in the sun. I tried to stand up and it broke almost sending me to the floor. NOT WORTH THE MONEY!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

product_meta.title: Core Equipment Folding Oversized Padded Moon Round Saucer Chair
product_meta.description: Sit and relax in the CORE Oversized Padded Round Chair! This cozy chair features a sturdy steel frame with a 300lb weight capacity, an oversized, plush, quilted seat made from 600D brushed polyester. A padded headrest provides extra comfort and support while a built-in cup holder keeps drinks close by. Perfect for camping, sporting events and backyard hangouts, the CORE Oversized Padded Round Chair will keep you comfortable during any outing.
feature_bullets: Oversized cozy Egg shaped chair with quilted seat; padded headrest provides extra comfort and support
Folding, durable steel frame with 300lb weight capacity; 600D Brushed polyester soft-touch saucer shape seat
Built-in cup holder; carry bag with carry strap for easy transport and storage
Perfect for the lawn, camping, sporting events, outdoor activities; 1 year limited warranty
